title: [RouteContext] Migrate routes/instance_config/toggle.py (10 functions)
body:
## Objective
Migrate `src/domolibrary2/routes/instance_config/toggle.py` to use the RouteContext pattern.

## Reference Implementation
See `src/domolibrary2/routes/appdb/collections.py` for the canonical example.

## Tasks
- [ ] Add `RouteContext` import: `from ...client.context import RouteContext`
- [ ] Update all 10 `@gd.route_function` decorated functions to accept `context` parameter
- [ ] Add context normalization inside each function
- [ ] Update `get_data()` calls to use `context=context`
- [ ] Verify all tests pass
- [ ] Update `TO_DOS/routes/instance_config.toggle.md` to mark functions as complete

## Migration Pattern

Each function should follow this pattern:

```python
@gd.route_function
async def function_name(
    auth: DomoAuth,
    required_param: str,
    *,  # Make following params keyword-only
    context: RouteContext | None = None,
    session: httpx.AsyncClient | None = None,
    debug_api: bool = False,
    debug_num_stacks_to_drop: int = 1,
    parent_class: Optional[str] = None,
    return_raw: bool = False,
) -> rgd.ResponseGetData:
    """Docstring here."""
    if context is None:
        context = RouteContext(
            session=session,
            debug_api=debug_api,
            debug_num_stacks_to_drop=debug_num_stacks_to_drop,
            parent_class=parent_class,
        )

    url = f"https://{auth.domo_instance}.domo.com/api/..."

    res = await gd.get_data(
        auth=auth,
        method="GET",
        url=url,
        context=context,  # Use context instead of individual params
    )

    if not res.is_success:
        raise SomeError(res=res)

    return res
```

## Functions to Update
- [ ] `get_is_invite_social_users_enabled` (line 33)
- [ ] `toggle_is_invite_social_users_enabled` (line 71)
- [ ] `get_is_user_invite_notifications_enabled` (line 127)
- [ ] `toggle_is_user_invite_enabled` (line 166)
- [ ] `get_is_weekly_digest_enabled` (line 210)
- [ ] `toggle_is_weekly_digest_enabled` (line 248)
- [ ] `get_is_left_nav_enabled_v1` (line 288)
- [ ] `get_is_left_nav_enabled` (line 327)
- [ ] `toggle_is_left_nav_enabled_v1` (line 366)
- [ ] `toggle_is_left_nav_enabled` (line 409)

## Success Criteria
- All functions accept optional `context` parameter
- All functions normalize context if not provided
- All `get_data()` calls use context
- Existing tests pass without modification
- No breaking changes (legacy parameters still work via decorator)

## Related Files
- TODO: `external/dl-remuxed/TO_DOS/routes/instance_config.toggle.md`
- Implementation Plan: `external/dl-remuxed/code_review/route-context-implementation-plan.md`
